Directions: In bread machine pan, place the first nine ingredients in order suggested by manufacturer.  Select basic bread setting.  Choose crust color and loaf size if available.  Bake according to bread machine directions (check dough after 5 minutes of mixing; add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water or flour if needed).  Just before final kneading (you machine may audibly signal this), add walnuts and raisins.
